episodes.description: Anna Mitzel from Ukraine who has been drawn to "onigiri" explores the secret behind its charm together with Poet Arthur Binard. She says, "It's more than just food. The cook's love is in it."
episodes.subtitle: ONIGIRI
episodes.title: Japan Lost and Found

episodes.description: Stephanie Crohin from France is really into "sento." She and Poet Arthur Binard unravel its charm. She is drawn to the beauty of sento houses and really likes friendly conversation there.
episodes.subtitle: SENTO
episodes.title: Japan Lost and Found
